title: Padichu Paathen Song Lyrics Polladhavan
stanzas: <div>Padichu Paathen Song Lyrics Polladhavan

Padichu paaththen yearavilla
kudichu paaththen yeariduchu(2)

sirichu paathean sirikkavilla
morachu paathean sikkiduchchu

naange appaa kaasil beeradippom
S.M.S. il saittadippom
 vetti payannu peareduppom
city bussil visiladippom (2)

Indha vayasu ponaa
veara vayasu illa
azhage rasikkalennaa
avanthaan manushane illa

Padichu paaththen yearavilla
kudichu paaththen yeariduchu

Kalyaanatha seiyum bodhu
panjaangaththai paarppavane
kaadhalikka panjangatha paarppadhillaye

naalu nearam paarththu paarththu
mudhaliravu poravane
pulle porakkum nearaththa
nee solla mudiyumaa

rendu viralil sigarettu vachu
izhukkumbodhu thee pandham
pazhiya soththa pothachu vachu
parugumbodhu aanandham
kanavu illa kavala illa
ivanppola evanum illa

Indha vayasu ponaa
veara vayasu illa
azhage rasikkalennaa
avanthaan manushane illa

Padichu paaththen yearavilla
kudichu paaththen yeariduch

Ennadi ennadi muniyammaa
veththala maiyi muniyammaa
yaar vacha maiyi muniyammaa
naan vacha maiyi muniyammaa

Pattucheela koottaththil
patttamboochchi pole vanthu
pambaramaa aadapporean
onga munnaale

ye maadi veettu maalavikaa
vaazhmeenu pole vanthu
pallakkaatti kooppiduthu
paadhi kannaale

narambu ellaam murukku yeara
nadanamaada poreandaa
malluveatti maappille paiyaa
machchaan koode aadeandaa

puduchu aadu mudichu aadu
vidinja pinnaal mudichupodu

Indha vayasu ponaa
veara vayasu illa
azhage rasikkalennaa
avanthaan manushane illa

Padichu paaththen yearavilla
kudichu paaththen yeariduchu(2)

sirichu paathean sirikkavilla
morachu paathean sikkiduchchu

naange appaa kaasil beeradippom
S.M.S. il saittadippom
 vetti payannu peareduppom
city bussil visiladippom (2)

Indha vayasu ponaa
veara vayasu illa
azhage rasikkalennaa
avanthaan manushane illa
